description: MainActivity.kt is a primary source file for an Android application built with Jetpack Compose. It defines the application's main activity, setting up the UI theme, navigation between different screens (list, create/edit, view note), and interacting with in-memory data repositories. The file includes composable functions for UI components such as note list, note detail, and editing screens, and manages state and user interactions.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main entry point for the app, setting up theme and UI on creation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes MainActivity, sets up settings repository, and defines the activity's UI content.

methods.name: AppTheme
methods.description: Sets the Material theme with the selected color scheme based on high contrast setting.

methods.name: OceanProfessionalNotesApp
methods.description: Main composable managing app state, navigation, theme, and note repository.

methods.name: TopBar
methods.description: Top app bar with title, back button, and overflow menu for high contrast toggle.

methods.name: NotesListScreen
methods.description: Displays list of notes fetched from repository, handles loading and empty states.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: UI card component displaying individual note with title and snippet, styled for high contrast.

methods.name: CreateEditScreen
methods.description: Form for creating or editing a note, with validation, cancel, and save functionality.

methods.name: ViewNoteScreen
methods.description: Displays note details with options to edit or delete, including confirmation dialog for deletion.

methods.name: LoadingState
methods.description: Displays a loading indication while data is being fetched.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: Displays message when there are no notes.
